Address: Barrio Turístico Cantón Alausí060254 Huigra
Description:
An outdoor swimming pool surrounded by gardens and hammocks can be enjoyed in Huigra, 500 metres from the train station and 200 metres from Panama Cascade. Wi-Fi is free. Nariz del Diablo station is a 40-minute drive away. Hostería La Eterna Primavera also offers outdoor activities.

Guests staying at Hostería La Eterna Primavera can book rooms with private bathrooms.

Regional and international dishes can be enjoyed at the restaurant.

La Eterna Primavera offers 24-hour front desk assistance. Private parking is free. Please inform Hostería La Eterna Primavera in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Please note that the propertys restaurant and room service are available daily from 08:00 until 21:00.

Attractions:

Monument to Saint Peter - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi

Huigra Park - 33.9 km / 21.1 mi

Church of Guamote - 45.8 km / 28.5 mi
Description:
HeadLine : Near Monument to Saint Peter

Location : With a stay at Hotel Noris Alausí in Alausi, you ll be a 2-minute walk from Monument to Saint Peter and 6 minutes by foot from Alausi Main Square. This hotel is 20.4 mi (32.8 km) from Nariz del Diablo and 21.1 mi (33.9 km) from Huigra Park.

Rooms : Stay in one of 18 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Stop by the hotel s restaurant for lunch or dinner. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 9 AM.

Address: Avenida 5 de Junio 122 Y Pedro de loza060201 Alausí
Description:
Located in Alausí, Hostal Gampala features an on-site restaurant, free WiFi access and free private parking.

Each room here will provide you with a cable TV, bed linen and a washer and dryer. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

At Hostal Gampala you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk. Please inform Hostal Gampala in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Address: La Quinta de La Falilia Rivadeneira barrio Mullenquiz 060250 Alausí
Description:
Killa Wasi Hostel is set in Alausí and features barbecue facilities. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, and organising tours for guests.

At the hostel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. All units will provide guests with a fridge.

You can play darts at Killa Wasi Hostel, and bike hire is available.

Address: Eloy Alfaro 167 Diagonal A La Estación Del Tren060250 Alausí
Description:
Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, La posada de Carlitos offers accommodation in Alausí. Guests can enjoy the on-site gallery and bar. Continental breakfast is available for a surcharge.

Some rooms at La Posada de Carlitos offer a private batrhoom with a shower, other bathrooms are shared. Free toiletries are included. Daily maid service is provided.

Guests at La Posada de Carlitos have access to a shared lounge and kitchen as well as a tour desk. Parking is available for a surcharge.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and a souvenir store. Guayaquil airport is 200 km away. Please note that guests must be 7 years old or older.

Address: Sucre N141 y Bolivar Alausi
Description:
Set in Alausí, within 400 metres of Alausí and 700 metres of Mirador, Hotel El Molino Alausí offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.

At the hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hotel El Molino Alausí.

Lookout house is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Zulas valley is 7.7 km from the property.

Address: Av. Capitan Ponton Barrio Buha. A 600 Metros Del Estadio 060201 Alausi
Description:
Hosteria Rincón de Isabel is located in Alausí. Free WiFi access and free private parking are available.

Each room has a rustic décor features a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

At Hosteria Rincón de Isabel you will find a peaceful garden and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, an ironing service and laundry facilities.

The propertys on-site restaurant is specialized in traditional Ecuadorian meals and is available for large groups.


Mariscal Lamar Airport, in Cuenca, is a 2-hour drive away.

Address: Antonio Mora Y 9 De Octubre
Description:
Hostal Ventura Alausí is set in Alausí and features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is free private parking and the property offers paid airport shuttle service.

The units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hostal Ventura Alausí also provide guests with a city view.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Guests at Hostal Ventura Alausí will be able to enjoy activities in and around Alausí, like cycling. Please inform Hostal Ventura Alausí in advance of your expected arrival time. Address: Avenida Cevallos 1014 Ambato
Description:
Boasting a panoramic terrace with city views, spa facilities and an on-site gym, Emperador has rooms with chic décor and city views in Ambato. Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool.

Hotel Emperador has suites and rooms with air conditioning, flat screen TV and comfortable seating areas. Suites also feature hot tubs, kitchenettes and DVD players.

An American breakfast with tropical fruits can be enjoyed daily and guests can enjoy regional dishes at the restaurant.

Museo del Colegio Bolivar is 300 metres away. The main bus station is 1 km away. Car rental can be arranged and there is free private parking.

Quito City is 136 km from Emperador and shuttles to Latacunga Airport, 45 km away, are possible for a fee. Sauna is closed from Sat 06 Feb 2021 until Wed 31 Mar 2021
Spa/wellness centre is closed from Sat 06 Feb 2021 until Wed 31 Mar 2021
Hot tub/jacuzzi is closed from Sat 06 Feb 2021 until Wed 31 Mar 2021

Description:
Located 5 km from central Ambato, Hotel Versailles offers a hot tub, a restaurant and functional rooms with mountain views. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided.

Each room at Hotel Versailles has functional décor, a desk and satellite TV. The private bathrooms come with a shower. American breakfast is included in the rate.

At Hotel Versailles you will find a bar, meeting facilities and a 24-hour front desk with information about the area. Airport transfers can be arranged at an extra cost.

Cotopaxi International Airport is located 50 km from Hotel Versailles. The Cotopaxi Volcano is around an hours drive away, while Quito is a 2-hour drive away.

Address: Avenida Cevallos Y Martinez Ambato
Description:
Offering a spa and wellness centre and a restaurant, Hotel Mary Carmen is located in the Tungurahua Province in Ambato, 2 hours away from Quito. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Rooms here will provide you with a TV. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and towels. Extras include linen.

The restaurant at Hotel Mary Carmen is specialized in typical cuisine of the region.

At Hotel Mary Carmen you will find a fitness centre along with other facilities, such as a tour desk, shops on site and an ironing service. The property offers free parking.

Address: Guayaquil 01 08 Y Rocafuerte Rocafuerte180150 Ambato
Description:
Offering a terrace and a garden, Hotel Ambato offers accommodations 500 metres from Montalvo park and 800 meters from Cevallos Park, the commercial area and city centre. Free WiFi access is available.

Rooms here offer mountain views and include cable TV, a work desk. All come with a wardrobe and a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

The hotel surroundings offer the Museum of the Casa del Portal, only a 5-minute drive away. In addition, free private parking is available.

This property is located  a 15-minutes drive from La Familia Park. Baños Hot Springs can be reached after a 45 minutes drive, while Quitos International Airport is just a 2 hours away by car. Please inform Hotel Ambato in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Offering a restaurant, Roka Plaza Hotel Boutique is a modified colonial house located in Ambato. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room here has a private bathroom with a shower or a bath and free toiletries. Extras include cleaning products.

At Roka Plaza Hotel Boutique you will find a 24-hour front desk and a sushi bar. The property offers free parking.

Cotopaxi International Airport can be reached after a 45-minute drive.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Museum of Natural Science

Location : A stay at Hotel Imperial places you in the heart of Ambato, within a 5-minute drive of Bellavista Stadium and Col Nac Bolivar Museum. This hotel is 0.8 mi (1.3 km) from Museum of Natural Science and 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Juan Montalvo Park.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 31 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite at the hotel s coffee shop/cafe, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

Address: Rodrigo Pachano Y Montalvo Ficoa Ficoa180150 Ambato
Description:
Ficoa Real Suites is located in Ambatos commercial zone. This modern hotel features an on-site lounge and is just 500 metres from Quinta de Juan Leon Mera museum.

Each one of the 10 rooms here boasts elegant décor and comes equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, a work desk and a safety-deposit box. They also include free WiFi access and a private bathroom with a shower, toilet and a hairdryer.

At Ficoa Real Suites you will find a 24-hour front desk, free private parking and a garden. Other facilities offered include a tour desk, luggage storage and dry cleaning.

Guests will be able to find a variety of restaurants, supermarkets and banks within a few steps. A free daily American breakfast is offered.

The popular Avenida Ceballos can be reached in 5 minutes by car, while the Botanical Gardens are less than 2 km from Ficoa Real Suites. Additionally, the hotel can assist with information on how to reach a number of cultural tourist attractions. Please inform Ficoa Real Suites in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Address: Avenida Cevallos 15-34 Martinez180150 Ambato
Description:
Hotel Novalux is a 4-star property set in Ambato. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge, room service and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is located 48 km from Tarabita Cable Car.

At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hotel Novalux also provide guests with a city view. All units in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Guests at Hotel Novalux can enjoy an American breakfast.

A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at the hotel. Speaking both English and Spanish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay.

The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 157 km from Hotel Novalux.

Address: Calle Olmedo y Lrancisco Flor
Description:
Featuring free WiFi and a barbecue, La Kapital Hotel offers accommodation in Ambato, 29 km from Baños and 5 minutes from the Cathedral and the historical center. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the mountains, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area where you can relax. Rooms come with a private bathroom. Superior rooms include a spa bath or a hot tub.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and a traditional chiva bus is available for special events.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. San Andrés is 39 km from La Kapital Hotel , while Riobamba is 48 km away.

Address: Av. Circunvalación Y Transversal 16 150350 Archidona
Description:
Hotel Palmar del Río Premiun is located in Archidona on the entrance of the Ecuadorian Amazon and offers an outdoor pool, a hot tub and a restaurant with a choice between 2 types of breakfast. The hotel organizes trips like cavern expeditions or river rides.

Each room here comes equipped with a  TV, tiled floors and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. They also include a small wardrobe and a fan.

Guests can eat at the hotel, or explore any of the restaurants available within a 5-minute drive. El Arca Zoo is just 6 km from the property, while Las Cavernas de Jumandy caves are less than a 2-minute walk away. The ctiys town square is a short walk away and guests can find typical dishes there.

The on-site tour desk can help guests plan activities like hiking, bike tours, rafting, boating and outings to caverns, waterfalls and more. The city of Quito can be reached in a 3-hour drive and the hotel can offer shuttle services from to the airport. Please inform Hotel Palmar del Río Premium in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Property Location
Located in Misahualli, Suchipakari Jungle Lodge is on the riverwalk, within a 15-minute drive of AmaZOOnico and Quechua Indigenous Community. This 4-star lodge is 7.4 mi (11.9 km) from Butterfly Farm and 21.2 mi (34.2 km) from Jumandy Monument.

Rooms

Dining

Address: Comunidad Santo Domingo Del Hollin 150350 ArchidonaNapo
Description:
With garden views, Kuyana Amazon Lodge is set in Archidona and has a restaurant, a shared lounge, bar, garden, year-round outdoor pool and terrace. Both WiFi and private parking are accessible at the lodge free of charge.

There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Kuyana Amazon Lodge.

Hiking and cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International, 177 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Kuyana Amazon Lodge in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.

Address: Via Ayapata Inchillaqui
Description:
REMA Amazon Lodge features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Tena. The hotel also provides free WiFi and free private parking.

At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony with a garden view. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at REMA Amazon Lodge also provide guests with pool view. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 168 km from REMA Amazon Lodge. Please inform REMA Amazon Lodge in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Atacames Beach

Location : With a stay at Hotel El Marqués, you ll be centrally located in Atacames, within a 15-minute drive of Atacames Beach and Sua Beach. This beach hotel is 2.5 mi (4 km) from Castelnuovo Beach and 3.1 mi (5 km) from Playa Tonsupa.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 172 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel s bar/lounge, Shamu, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts major credit cards and cash

Special Instructions : Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
Property Location
Located in Atacames, Chill Inn is convenient to Atacames Beach and Castelnuovo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 2 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby. Additional features include tour/ticket assistance and a picnic area.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.
